quote: Reality is wrong. Dreams are for real.
author: Unknown

quote: A coward dies a thousand deaths. A soldier dies but once.
author: Unknown

quote: During your life, never stop dreaming. No one can take away your dreams.
author: Tupac Shakur

quote: There’s gonna be some stuff you gonna see thats gonna make it hard to smile in the future, but through whatever you see, through all the rain and the pain you gotta keep your sense of humor. You gotta be able to smile through all this bullshit…remember that.
author: Unknown

quote: I don’t see myself being special; I just see myself having more responsibilities than the next man. People look to me to do things for them, to have answers.
author: Unknown

quote: It’s the game of life. Do I win or do I lose? One day they’re gonna shut the game down. I gotta have as much fun and go around the board as many times as I can before it’s my turn to leave.
author: Unknown

quote: I think I’m a natural-born leader. I know how to bow down to authority if it’s authority that I respect.
author: Unknown

quote: For every dark night, there’s a brighter day.
author: Tupac Shakur

quote: I know it seems hard sometimes but remember one thing. Through every dark night, theres a bright day after that. So no matter how hard it get, stick your chest out, keep ya head up and handle it.
author: Unknown

quote: It’s a struggle for every young Black man. You know how it is, only God can judge us.
author: Unknown

quote: I just don’t know how to deal with so many people giving me that much affection. I never had that in my life.
author: Unknown

quote: All I’m trying to do is survive and make good out of the dirty, nasty, unbelievable lifestyle that they gave me.
author: Unknown

quote: Life’s a wheel of fortune and it’s my chance to spin it.
author: Tupac Shakur

quote: When you do rap albums, you got to train yourself. You got to constantly be in character.
author: Unknown

quote: Somebody help me, tell me where to go from here cause even thugs cry, but do the Lord care?
author: Unknown

quote: We wouldn’t ask why a rose that grew from the concrete for having damaged petals; in turn, we would all celebrate its tenacity, we would all love its will to reach the sun. Well, we are the roses, this is the concrete and these are my damaged petals. Don’t ask me why, thank God, and ask me how.
author: Unknown

quote: Everybody’s at war with different things. I’m at war with my own heart sometimes.
author: Tupac Shakur

quote: I would rather have been shot straight-up in cold blood-but to be set up? By people who you trusted? That’s bad.
author: Unknown

quote: Let the Lord judge the criminals.
author: Unknown

quote: The only thing that comes to a sleeping man is dreams.
author: Unknown

quote: What I learned in jail is that I can’t change. I can’t live a different lifestyle – this is it. This is the life that they gave and this is the life that I made.
author: Unknown

quote: I’m a reflection of the community.
author: Unknown

quote: We all gonna die, we bleed from similar veins.
author: Unknown

quote: I’d rather die like a man, than live like a coward.
author: Tupac Shakur

quote: I feel like role models today are not meant to be put on a pedestal. But more like angels with broken wings.
author: Unknown

quote: My mama always used to tell me: ‘if you can’t find somethin’ to live for, you best find somethin’ to die for.’
author: Unknown

quote: If God wanted me to be quiet he would’ve never showed me what he does.
author: Unknown

quote: I’ll probably be punished for hard living.
author: Unknown

quote: I am society’s child. This is how they made me and now I’m sayin’ what’s on my mind and they don’t want that. This is what you made me, America.
author: Unknown

quote: Though things change, the future’s still inside of me.
author: Tupac Shakur

quote: I don’t have no fear of death. My only fear is coming back reincarnated.
author: Unknown

quote: I’m 23 years old. I might just be my mother’s child, but in all reality, I’m everybody’s child. Nobody raised me; I was raised in this society.
author: Unknown

quote: There’s nobody in the business strong enough to scare me.
author: Unknown

quote: In my mind I’m a blind man doin’ time.
author: Unknown

quote: With all my fans I got a family again.
author: Unknown

quote: I believe that everything that you do bad comes back to you. So everything that I do that’s bad, I’m going to suffer from it. But in my mind, I believe what I’m doing is right. So I feel like I’m going to heaven.
author: Unknown

quote: It seems like every time you come up something happens to bring you back down.
author: Tupac Shakur

quote: Of course I’m going to say “I’m a thug,” that’s because I came from the gutter and I’m still here!
I’ve been shot five times but I’m still breathing, living proof there a God if you need a reason.
author: Unknown

quote: I don’t want to be a role model. I just want to be someone who says, this is who I am, this is what I do, I say what’s on my mind.
author: Unknown

quote: If we really are saying that rap is an art form, then we got to be more responsible for our lyrics. If you see everybody dying because of what you are saying, it don’t matter that you didn’t make them die. It just matters that you didn’t save them.
author: Unknown

quote: Death is not the greatest loss in life. The greatest loss is what dies inside while still alive. Never surrender.
author: Unknown

quote: I’m not sayin’ I’m gonna rule the world, or that I’m gonna change the world, but I guarantee that I will spark the brain that will change the world.
author: Tupac Shakur

quote: That which does not kill me can only make me stronger. I don’t see why everybody feel as though that they gotta tell me how to live my life.
author: Unknown

quote: Forgive but don’t forget, girl keep your head up. And when he tells you you ain’t nothing, don’t believe him. And if he can’t learn to love you, you should leave him.
author: Unknown

quote: Can’t close my eyes cause all I see is terror. I hate the man in the mirror cause his reflection makes the pain turn realer.
author: Unknown

quote: Fear is stronger than love, remember that. Fear is stronger than love. All that love I gave didn’t mean nothing when it came to fear.
author: Unknown

quote: One day I’m gonna bust, blow up on this society. Why did you lie to me? I couldn’t find a trace of equality.
author: Unknown

quote: The seed must grow regardless of the fact that it’s planted in stone.
author: Tupac Shakur

quote: Every day, I’m standing outside trying to sing my way in: We are hungry, please let us in We are hungry, please let us in. After about a week that song is gonna change to: We hungry, we needsome food. After two, three weeks, it’s like: Give me the food Or I’m breaking down the door. After a year you’re just like: I’m picking the lock. Coming through the door blasting.
author: Unknown

quote: I have not brought violence to you. I have not brought ‘thug life’ to America. I didn’t create ‘thug life;’ I diagnosed it.
author: Unknown

quote: If I was white, I would be like John Wayne. I feel like a tragic hero in a Shakespeare play. Somebody who pulled himself up by his bootstraps, from poverty.
author: Unknown

quote: Behind every sweet smile, there is a bitter sadness that no one can see and feel.
author: Tupac Shakur

quote: I said, I’m gonna write a song about the women like my mom, women like my sister, who I think represent the strong black women, and I did that. Now I’mma write about the women I see everyday and that was ‘[I] Get Around.’ If I just write songs like ‘Keep Ya Head Up’ it would make me seem more than what I am, but I’m just a normal man.
author: Unknown

quote: What makes me saying ‘I don’t give a f***,’ different from Patrick Henry saying ‘Give me liberty or give me death?’ What makes my freedom any different than Bosnians or who ever [America] wants to fight for this year? They should give money to the ghetto.
author: Unknown

quote: Don’t live to fight, fight to live.
author: Tupac Shakur

quote: Hip Hop when it started it was supposed to be this new thing that had no boundaries and was so different to everyday music. Now it seems like I was starting to get caught up in the mode of what made hip hop come about. As long as the music has the true to the heart soul it can be hip hop. As long it has soul to it, hip hop can live on.
author: Unknown

quote: Why can’t [the President] take some of those people off the street and put them in his White House? Then he’ll have people from the street to help him with his ideas. They haven’t been homeless forever; they’ve done things for society.
author: Unknown

quote: I want to grow. I want to be better. You grow. We all grow. We’re made to grow. You either evolve or you disappear.
author: Tupac Shakur

quote: Until it happened, I really did believe that no Black person would ever shoot me. I believed that I didn’t have to fear my own community, You know, I was like I represent them. I’m their ambassador to the world, they will never do me wrong.
author: Unknown

quote: Every time I speak I want the truth to come out. Every time I speak I want a shiver. I don’t want them to be like they know what I’m gonna say because it’s polite. I’m not saying I’m gonna rule the world or I’m gonna change the world, but I guarantee you that I will spark the brain that will change the world.
author: Unknown

quote: I set goals, take control, drink out my own bottle. I make mistakes but learn from every one. And when it’s said and done, I bet this brother be a better one. If I upset you don’t stress; never forget, that God isn’t finished with me yet.
author: Unknown

quote: If you let a person talk long enough you’ll hear their true intentions! Listen twice, speak once.
author: Tupac Shakur

quote: We can never go nowhere unless we share with each other.
author: Unknown

quote: You can spend minutes, hours, days, weeks, or months over-analyzing a situation; trying to put the pieces together, justifying what could’ve, would’ve happened…or you can just leave the pieces on the floor and move the f*** on.
author: Unknown

quote: Never surrender, it’s all about the faith you got; don’t ever stop, just push it ‘till you hit the top and if you drop, at least you know you gave your all to be true to you, that way you can never fail.
author: Unknown

quote: Even the genius asks questions.
author: Tupac Shakur

quote: The same crime element that white people are scared of black people are scared of. While they waiting for legislation to pass, we next door to the killer. All them killers they let out, they’re in that building. Just because we black, we get along with the killers? What is that?
author: Unknown

quote: I shall not fear man but God, though I walk through the valley of death.
author: Unknown

quote: I am not a perfectionist, but still I seek perfection. I am not a great romantic, but yet I yearn for affection.
author: Tupac Shakur

quote: Even warriors put their spears down on Sundays.
author: Unknown

quote: There’s no way I could pay you back but my plan is to show you that I understand, you are appreciated.
author: Unknown

quote: You just can’t be calling us fakers and pretenders and non-creative and say we can’t freestyle.
author: Unknown

quote: No matter who committed the crime, they all yell at me. And the media is greedier than most. You could sell ‘em your soul and they’ll be on ya till a nigga’s a ghost.
author: Unknown

quote: I feel like Black Jesus got his hands on me and guides me through life to put me where I’m supposed to be.
author: Unknown

quote: You can never “just be friends” with someone you fall in love with.
Follow your heart, but take your brain with you.
author: Tupac Shakur

quote: It takes skill to be real. Time to heal each other.
author: Unknown

quote: Out of anger comes controversy, out of controversy comes conversation, out of conversation comes action.
author: Unknown

quote: America wants its respect.
author: Unknown

quote: I worked hard all my life as far as this music business. I dreamed of the day when I could go to New York and feel comfortable and they could come out here and be comfortable.
author: Unknown

quote: The only time I have problems is when I sleep.
author: Unknown

quote: If you could walk a mile in my shoes you’d be crazy too.
author: Tupac Shakur

quote: I didn’t choose the thug life, the thug life chose me.
author: Unknown

quote: No matter what these people say about me, my music doesn’t glorify any image. My music is spiritual when you listen to it. It’s all about emotion, I tell my innermost, darkest secrets.
author: Unknown

quote: Don’t change on me. Don’t extort me unless you intend to do it forever.
author: Unknown

quote: They got money for the war but can’t feed the poor.
author: Unknown

quote: What people do for the struggle of power is madness.
author: Unknown

quote: Imperfection is inherited, therefore we all sin, but fighting the war of sin is the greatest war of all because we all die in the end, no matter how hard we fight.
author: Unknown

quote: I’m not perfect. But I’ll always be real.
author: Tupac Shakur

quote: I know death follows me, but I murder him first.
author: Unknown

quote: Ain’t a woman alive that can take my momma’s place.
author: Unknown

quote: This fast life soon shatters, cause after all the lights and screams, nothing but my dreams matter.
author: Unknown

quote: Unconditional love. Talking bout the stuff that don’t wear off, it don’t fade. It’ll last for all these crazy days, these crazy nights. Whether you wrong or you right, I’ma still love you, still feel you, still there for you. No matter what, you will always be in my heart with unconditional love.
author: Unknown

quote: I know what good morals are, but you’re supposed to disregard good morals when you’re living in a crazy, bad world. If you’re in hell, how can you live like an angel? You’re surrounded by devils,trying to be an angel? That’s like suicide.
author: Unknown

quote: I don’t want it if it’s that easy.
author: Tupac Shakur

quote: It don’t stop ’til the casket drop.
author: Unknown

quote: I am a hard person to love but when I love, I love really hard.
author: Unknown

quote: I did not wanted to become the victim, so became the bully.
author: Unknown

quote: Don’t believe everything you hear. Real eyes, realize, real lies.
author: Unknown

quote: We was young and we was dumb, but we had heart.
author: Unknown

quote: Is it a crime to fight for what is mine?
author: Tupac Shakur

quote: Many dreams are what we had and plenty wishes.
author: Unknown

quote: If you had any consciousness of the reality we live in, you could feel his energy. You knew he was a special individual. He was very prolific in expressing himself. He had a lot of hostility. I think it was just misguided and misdirected. It was obvious he was a genius, he was a prodigy. He was just amazing as far as his energy was concerned. He was explosive — like a black panther ready to pounce.
author: Mike Tyson

quote: He was so polite and nice. He was counter to his persona.
author: Will Ferrell

quote: I’ve had never in my life met a person like Pac. He had so much charisma. And he was poor. When I met Pac, he owned two pairs of pants and two sweaters. He used to tell me all the time. He was like, ‘Jada, you’re a superstar.’ He didn’t say it about himself.
author: Jada Pinkett Smith

quote: Tupac was a revolutionary, and being a revolutionary takes more than shooting pistols and getting tattoos.
author: B.o.B.

quote: Every time I think about Tupac or hear a song, I think about how much work he put in. He could never have put in that much if he didn’t have passion for it. The things that he talked about, he actually believed.
author: Billy Danze

quote: Tupac taught me that in truth there is freedom. He spoke his mind and said what was in his heart.
author: Common
